string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: This course introduces the fundamentals of the Python programming language, covering basic syntax and concepts for beginners.
Discrete mathematics is a branch of mathematics that deals with countable, distinct, and separate objects. This course explores topics like set theory, graph theory, and combinatorics.

Design thinking is a problem-solving approach that emphasizes empathy, creativity, and collaboration. In this course, students learn how to tackle complex problems through a human-centered design process.
This course focuses on building web applications using various programming languages and technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web frameworks.
This course covers the fundamentals of mobile app development, including app design, user interfaces, and the use of mobile app development platforms.

Data structures are essential components of computer science. This course explores various data structures like arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs, along with their applications in software development.
This course provides a foundational understanding of mathematical concepts, including algebra, calculus, and statistics, to support more advanced studies in mathematics and related fields.
Data science involves analyzing and extracting insights from large datasets. This course covers topics like data cleaning, statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization.
This course delves into the principles and protocols that govern computer networks, including topics like network architecture, routing, and network security.
Game programming focuses on creating video games and interactive simulations. This course teaches students how to develop games using programming languages and game engines.
